workshoptitle: My First MicroProfile Application with Helidon MP

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Generate Helidon MP project using Project Starter
Lab 2: Create Helidon MP application GraalVM native image
Lab 3: Modify the application by adding a custom Endpoint
Lab 4: Build and Push Helidon Application docker image to Oracle Cloud Container Registry
Lab 5: Run the  Helidon Application Image on Compute Instance
Oracle CloudWorld 2022 - Get Help
